Contact us at dotficgaming@gmail.com to report bugs or feedback!

System Requirements –

Minimum - 4GB RAM, 1GB Free Disk Space, 1024x576 display, Graphics Card with 1GB RAM

Recommended – 8 GB RAM, 64-bit full HD Display, Graphics Card with 4GB RAM

Supported on all Windows devices, Windows 7 & Above, and controls are mapped through a keyboard.

Our entry for NASA's Space App event; designed with the intent of delivering an experience that conveyed the multiple aspects of space exploration combined with our vision of astronomy a hundred years from now.
